sql.query: insert into BATCH_TEST2 (no1, no2, no3, date1, timestamp1, name, address, description) values (:no1, :no2, :no3, :date1, :timestamp1, :name, :address, :description)
SELECT no1, no2, no3, date1, timestamp1, name, address, description FROM BATCH_TEST WHERE NO1 > :no1 AND name= :name order by no1 asc
